Weapon - Class in adrenaline.model.deck
Weapon is a Card which contains the description about a single weapon available in the game and its effects

WeaponEffect - Class in adrenaline.model.deck
Abstract class for the effects of a weapon, implemented by subclasses

WeaponEffectRequirement - Interface in adrenaline.model.deck
WeaponEffectRequirement is implemented by subclasses
WeaponEffectTypeAdapter - Class in adrenaline.model.deck
WeaponEffectTypeAdapter is the class that read all the data of the weapons from the json files, extends TypeAdapter class

WeaponModeOptions - Class in adrenaline.data.data_for_client.data_for_game
This class is sent to the client to ask which effect they want to perform with the chosen weapon in the shoot action.
WeaponModeOptions(List<EffectDetails>) - Constructor for class adrenaline.data.data_for_client.data_for_game.WeaponModeOptions
 
WeaponsDeck - Class in adrenaline.model.deck
WeaponsDeck is the subclass that represents a Deck of Weapon cards

WeaponsDeckCreator - Class in adrenaline.model.deck
WeaponsDeckCreator is a subclass of DeckCreator, it creates the weapons' deck

WeaponsToDiscard - Class in adrenaline.data.data_for_client.data_for_game
This class is sent to the client to ask which weapon they want to discard after exceeding the maximum number of three.
WeaponsToDiscard(List<WeaponDetails>) - Constructor for class adrenaline.data.data_for_client.data_for_game.WeaponsToDiscard
 
WeaponType - Enum in adrenaline.model.deck
WeaponType is the enumeration class which lists all the weapon types in the game.
